Name: maximize_average_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average story points per sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize cumulative severity of all blockers

Name: minimize_feature_effort
Description: Prefer features with lower estimated effort

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize rate of sprint goal achievement

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Prefer smaller tasks to improve flow

Name: minimize_number_of_tasks
Description: Reduce number of tasks in the sprint backlog

Name: maximize_release_plan_coverage
Description: Maximize number of features covered by a release

Name: minimize_wip_on_board
Description: Reduce work-in-progress on the Scrum board

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Maximize focus on features relevant to stakeholders
